subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: I seem to have fallen asleep again.

subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: Alas, as an oracle of the tower, my dreams are never so simple.

subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: I must find a way out.

subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: Monsters of the unkown, often find themeselves astray in my dreams.

subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: I must be rid of them, if I am to find a way out and back to the real world.
